title: 508: Josh "The Punk" Thomson
description: In this episode, Sal, Adam & Justin speak with Josh “The Punk” Thomson. Josh a well-known mixed martial artist who currently competes in Bellator MMA's lightweight division. A professional competitor since 2001, Thomson has also competed in PRIDE, Strikeforce, UFC, & the World Fighting Alliance. Thomson is a former Strikeforce World Lightweight Champion and a former Strikeforce U.S. Lightweight Champion. (Wikipedia)
